Articles.Content:
I see there's support for 6 degree of freedom joysticks (like the 3DConnexion), but it's for Windows only!

The game's already super-awesome and everything, but could you please add support for OSX too? Pretty please?

I've also tried getting 3dConnexion mouse support working and all that happens is the camera spins way out of control. Turning the threshold on all 6 axes all the way up and the speed all the way down helps - after a fashion. The speed is almost manageable, but when you release the mouse, the camera keeps spinning. You can't stop it.

It's really too bad, because once you have gotten addicted to a 6 DOF mouse, anything else is painful.
